subSections.title: Readings
Usage notes
subSections.text:
This is used as part of a form of address for a customer, like [[sir]] or [[ma'am]]. Because a customer is in a much higher social position, this word is used with the honorific prefix {{ja-r|御|お-}} and the honorific suffix {{ja-r|さん|-さん}} or more often {{ja-r|様|-さま}}, rendering {{ja-r|お客さん|おきゃく-さん}} or {{ja-r|お客%様|おきゃく%-さま}}.

[[Category:Japanese basic words|きゃく]]
